attributes.action: erase all GP's from the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
GP's are an un-necessarily useless and expensive layer of the NHS.  
For minor ailments the pharmacist has more useful & up to date knowledge, for more urgent requirements, use A & E.
GP's surgeries are run for the convenience & profit of the doctors.
The practice's administration is for the benefit of Government statistics.  The patient is bottom of the pecking order.
Either reverse the order to ensure patient care is number one priority or prepare to suffer the long term consequences.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
